Durham.WRJD:
WRJD is a radio station based in Durham, North Carolina that broadcasts on 1410 AM which currently broadcasts a Spanish Christian format. It was a heritage radio station that went by WSRC for over half a century.


== History ==
The station signed on the air as WSRC on October 15, 1954, a day most locals remember as the day Hurricane Hazel roared through Central and Eastern North Carolina, causing a great deal of damage and destruction.
